title: Brae
description: When a lovable young border collie and his new family travel to a small Scottish island, adventure and mystery begin. The story takes place on the real Isle of Arran, off the southwest coast of Scotland. Filled with gorgeous watercolor illustrations, the book takes us along on Brae's island holiday. Part children's story, part travel guide, Brae Visits Arran will enchant readers of all ages!
author: Elisabeth Davis
